A Means of Overcoming Prejudice 

     Those who have long known the truth need to seek the Lord most earnestly, that their hearts may be filled with a determination to work for their neighbors. My brethren and sisters, visit those who live near you, and by sympathy and kindness seek to reach their hearts. Be sure to work in a way that will remove prejudice instead of creating it. --Testimonies for the Church, vol. 9, p. 34 (1909). 


   (554)
